item.title:
RT by @RosamundUrwin: Of the 107 people who have died in asylum housing since 2016, 17 have commit suicide - and it's getting worse year on year.
The Home Office doesn't record or share this data, so it's hugely important @LInvestigates and @TownsendMark do.
https://www.theguardian.com/uk-news/2022/jun/25/asylum-seekers-deaths-home-office-housing-data?CMP=Share_AndroidApp_Other
item.dc:creator: @NicolaKelly
item.description:
Of the 107 people who have died in asylum housing since 2016, 17 have commit suicide - and it's getting worse year on year.

The Home Office doesn't record or share this data, so it's hugely important @LInvestigates and @TownsendMark do.

item.title:
RT by @RosamundUrwin: I've been sick as often as not over the last two years.
In February it became clear that my third bout of covid had put my back on my arse and I was willing to do absolutely anything to speed my recovery.
Here's a bit of what I learnt and what I did:
https://www.thetimes.co.uk/article/9e708ff6-f15d-11ec-beb3-8cbcdd742a95?shareToken=92a04e2103bdde1c780983e5f6f94948
item.dc:creator: @thejohnsimpson

item.title: RT by @RosamundUrwin: Here's the final cover for the lovely hardback (described as 'sumptuous' by the Bookseller) of Dogs of the Deadlands, my mash-up of Watership Down, Call of the Wild, and War and Peace. Superb work from @RobinsonKH and the whole team at @Rocktheboatnews.
item.dc:creator: @anthony_mcgowan

item.title: RT by @RosamundUrwin: HELLO! I am extremely excited (and shocked) to say I am doing A BOOK. It’s called What Just Happened?! and it’s a collection of my columns from the past few years. Enter the shitshowverse! Below is the cover, and you can preorder it here from TODAY https://linktr.ee/WhatJustHappened
item.dc:creator: @MarinaHyde
